title: Snow White Is CANCELLED, Will Facebook Let Trump Back? 5.4.21
itunes:title: Snow White Is CANCELLED, Will Facebook Let Trump Back? 5.4.21
description:
In episode 901, Jack and Miles are joined by Yo Is This Racist's Andrew Ti to discuss Proud Boys Canada being designated as a terrorist organization, Facebook possibly allowing Trump back on their platform, herd immunity, business owners versus unemployment benefits, a study about looking at your phone, Snow White getting canceled, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Proud Boys Canada Breaks Up With Itself After Terrorist Designation
  2. Facebook Set to Decide Whether Trump Will Be Allowed Back on Platform
  3. Reaching ‘Herd Immunity’ Is Unlikely in the U.S., Experts Now Believe
  4. This is what happens when you extend unemployment benefits for too long and add a $1400 stimulus payment to it. Right when employers need workers to fully open back up, few can be found.
  5. Glancing at your phone quickly prompts other people to do the same
  6. Fox News Finds Its Dumb New Outrage: ‘Woke’ Mob Is ‘Canceling’ a Snow White Theme Park Ride
  7. LISTEN: GRISELDA - DR BIRDS (OFFICIAL VIDEO)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
